name: suspend_account
help:
suspend_account
options:
--account_num: account number for account to be terminated
--user_id: last 4 digits + letter of the user's NRIC e.g. 123A
--n_months: number of months to suspend the account for
success_message: Account suspension registered. A confirmation email will be sent to the email registered with the account within 2 hours. The email will contain a link to reactivate the account.
